page.title: 02A day in my life
page.content: I wake up about 7.15 a.m. It is Wednesday.I got dressed and went in the bathroom to wash .I go downstairs and have breakfast.I watch breakfast television until it is 8.30 then it is time to get my bike and ride one mile to school .School starts at 9.00.In the morning at school I have recorders and in the afternoon we have games .We usually have an hour of maths and half an hour of English. After school I ride my bike home and have tea .After tea I go riding my pony .After I go riding I watch television for a bit and then I ride my bike for a while .I go inside and feed the hamster before watching a television programme called Dallas . I go to bed and go to sleep at 9.00 p.m.
